labels.name: duplicate
labels.description: This issue or pull request already exists

labels.name: wontfix
labels.description: This will not be worked on

issues.title: Draft updates
issues.author: queekusme
issues.body:
- [ ] Remove the line about HTTP Accept headers
- [ ] Require a POST request
- [ ] Remove plain json responses
- [ ] Make nonce required in request and response
- [ ] Loosen the requirements for the attestation document `iss` claim to allow for any issuer which can be verified e.g. urls via a `.well-known/jwk.json` or via a registry
- [ ] Indicate that failure to verify the attestation document indicates the data is not to be considered trusted
- [ ] Include reference to what should happen if an SAD is not provided, aka wallets should fallback to existing methods for attesting issuers and verifiers
- [ ] Add some examples, review sd-jwt tooling for generating examples at build time
